summary: Two friends keep their vomiting a secret until one friend almost dies.
cast: Lynda Carter|Katie Wright|Marley Shelton|Josh Taylor|Colleen Winton|Kimberley Warnat|Malcolm Stewart|Kevin McNulty|Ryan Reynolds|Tobias Mehler|Sarah Sawatsky|Cathy Merriman|Lochlyn Munro|Nancy Kerr|Jill Teed|Robin Douglas|Andrew Wheeler|Kristy Cohen|Jerry Wasserman
title: Cuando las amistades matan
